thread.title: BOUTIQUE HEAVEN ON THE LEFT BANK
thread.title_full: BOUTIQUE HEAVEN ON THE LEFT BANK - Review of La Villa Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jkranias
title: BOUTIQUE HEAVEN ON THE LEFT BANK
text: Everything about La Villa is superb, including their logo. We like taking breakfast in different small cafes, so we can not comment on their breakfast. Across the street is Lauduree, the top patisserie in Paris. La Villa is in the centre of a Left Bank walking paradise, an area full of galleries, famous cafes and brasseries and only a ten minute walk, by pedestrian bridge over the river Seine, to the Louvre and its surrounding historic sites and parks. We plan to return to La Villa on our next visits to Paris.
